conversation.message: Hello Company_A—I'm Seeker_B and I’m very interested in your role. My top priority is joining Company_A, and I’m ready to commit if selected. I’d value the chance to contribute and grow with your team. Thank you for considering my application.

Accepting Seeker_B now would fill the only slot and foreclose the chance to match with a higher-ranked seeker later. Since Seeker_B sent [APPLY], I must choose accept/reject; I will reject to preserve capacity for higher-priority candidates.
